trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The zallax has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The zallax's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The zallax can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zallax makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its horn.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or have its body flayed by the zallax's claws. A flayed creature makes attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws with disadvantage until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Cresil's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}). Cresil can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Weakness
entries: Cresil emits an aura of soul-draining energy in a 30-foot radius. Each creature that is not a construct, fiend, or undead that starts its turn in the area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or become weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened target makes attack rolls with disadvantage, and its melee weapon attacks deal half damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Cresil fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Cresil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Cresil's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Cresil makes two flail attacks. Cresil can cast a spell in place of one of these attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) fire plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 4d12 + 8}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Drag Close
entries: Cresil makes a flail attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet toward Cresil.

legendary.name: Foul Excretion
entries: Cresil casts {@spell poison spray}.

legendary.name: Devour (2 actions)
entries: Cresil makes a bite attack.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, Eurynomus can move up to his speed toward a hostile creature that he can see.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Eurynomus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Eurynomus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Eurynomus's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Eurynomus makes three attacks: two with his claws and one with his tail slap. If he hits the same target with both claws attacks, he can take a bonus action to attack with his toothy maw.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Slap
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Toothy Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Corrosive Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Eurynomus exhales foul, corrosive gas from the depths of his bowels in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 20 ({@damage 8d4}) acid damage and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: Eurynomus moves up to his speed.

legendary.name: Brutal Tail
entries: Eurynomus attacks with his tail slap. If he hits and the total of his attack roll beat the target's AC by 5 or more, the target also moves {@dice 1d6} [ts] 5 feet away from Eurynomus.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Malohin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). Malohin can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Defy Detection
entries: Malohin can't be targeted by divination magic, cannot be perceived through scrying sensors, and cannot be detected by any effect or ability that senses demons or fiends.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: Malohin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Malohin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Malohin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Malohin's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Malohin can use his Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: one with his claws, one with his bite, and one with his stomp. He can cast a spell in place of his stomp attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. Malohin can grapple one target at a time. If the target is already {@condition grappled} by Malohin, the target takes an additional 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Malohin's choice that is within 120 feet of Malohin and aware of him must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to
Malohin's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Possession (1/Day)
entries: One humanoid that Malohin can see within 5 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by Malohin. Malohin then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. Malohin now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. Malohin can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and he retains his alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}. He otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, Malohin ends it as a bonus action, or Malohin is forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel evil and good} spell. When the possession ends, Malohin reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to Malohin's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

legendary.name: Invisibility
entries: Malohin casts {@spell invisibility} on himself.

legendary.name: Claws
entries: Malohin attacks with his claws.

legendary.name: Harm (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Malohin casts {@spell harm}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Merihim's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 21}). Merihim can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Disease Stems
entries: Six prehensile fleshy stems that each end in toothy maws emerge from Merihim's monstrous back. Noxious fumes billow out from these stems at the start of each of Merihim's turns.
The bodily gases spread out in a 30-foot radius and remain until the start of Merihim's next turn or until dispersed by a strong wind.

Each creature that starts its turn in the area must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. Constructs, fiends, and undead are immune to this effect. On a failed save, the creature contracts a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target is {@condition poisoned} and can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.
A target that successfully saves against this effect becomes immune to Merihim's Disease Stems for 24 hours.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Merihim fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Merihim has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Merihim's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Merihim regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Merihim makes two attacks: one with his claws and one with his palsied hand. Merihim can substitute Rend or
Smotherfume for his claws attack. Merihim can cast a spell in place of his palsied hand attack.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and
Merihim can't use his claws on another target.

action.name: Palsied Hand
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit with disadvantage, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage, and the target must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. While diseased in this way, the target is {@condition poisoned} and must repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns or reduce its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies and its soul wriggles free to become a manes under Merihim's control. A target that succeeds on the initial saving throw is immune to the effects of the disease for 24 hours. The disease can be removed only by a {@spell heal} spell or another disease-curing spell that is 6th level or higher.

action.name: Rend
entries: Merihim tears the flesh of a creature he has {@condition grappled}. The target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or take 29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Smotherfume
entries: Merihim lifts one creature he has {@condition grappled} and hangs it over his Disease Stems. The creature is subject to the effects of Merihim's Disease Stems and makes the saving throw with disadvantage.

legendary.name: Rend
entries: Merihim uses his Rend attack.

legendary.name: Spreading the Disease
entries: Merihim blights a creature he can see within 120 feet with a disease. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution spell or be subject to the effects of the {@spell contagion} spell.

legendary.name: Smother in Fumes
entries: Merihim uses his Smotherfume attack.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Philotanus's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}). Philotanus can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Philotanus is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 24}). Philotanus has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Philotanus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Philotanus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Philotanus's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Philotanus attacks twice with his rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage. If Philotanus scores a critical hit, he rolls damage three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Charm
entries: Philotanus magically attempts to charm a creature he can see within 120 feet. If the target can hear him, the target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by Philotanus for 24 hours. The target can repeat the saving throw whenever it takes damage from Philotanus, ending the effect on itself on a successful save. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this effect or to end it becomes immune to Philotanus's
Charm for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Philotanus makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Charming Words
entries: Philotanus uses his Charm action.

legendary.name: Come to Me
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by Philotanus that Philotanus can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed toward him and grants advantage to Philotanus's attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Slip Away
entries: Philotanus casts {@spell dimension door} or hold person.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rahu's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 21}). Rahu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: Rahu has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: Rahu is immune to any effect that would sense his emotions or read his thoughts, as well as any divination spell that he refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain Rahu's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Rahu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rahu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Rahu's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Rahu regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

Truth through Pain. Rahu can take a bonus action to ask a question of one creature within 120 feet of him that he can see. The target must make a {@dc 21} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target must answer the question truthfully and to the best of its knowledge. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to
Rahu's Truth through Pain for 24 hours.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: Rahu uses his torture tools on one creature he has {@condition grappled}. Choose one of the listed effects. A regeneration spell or healing magic of the same or higher level that's cast upon the target ends the effect on it.

action.name: • Don't Look at Me Like That
entries: Rahu sticks pins into the target's eyes. The target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) piercing damage and is {@condition blinded}.
• Not the Face! Rahu uses hooks to mutilate the target's face.
The target makes all Charisma attack rolls, checks, and saving throws with disadvantage.
• Kneel before Rahu. Rahu uses a serrated blade to cut the tendons in the back of the target's legs. The target can't stand up and can move only by crawling.

action.name: • That's Enough Out of You
entries: Rahu crushes the target's larynx with a pair of rusty pliers. The target cannot speak.
• Unhand Me! Rahu saws off one of the target's hands.

action.name: Teleport
entries: Rahu magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Amplify Pain
entries: Rahu amplifies the pain of one creature he can see within 120 feet. If the target doesn't have all of its hit points, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Rahu attacks with his claws.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Rahu uses his Teleport action.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silver weapons

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nergal's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). Nergal can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Магическая тьма не препятствует дьявольскому темному зрению.

trait.name: Flesh-Eating Weapons
entries: Nergal's weapon attacks are magical. When

Nergal hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage (included in the attack) and the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be affected by flesh rot as if Nergal had cast the spell on the target.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Nergal fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Nergal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nergal makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Wounding Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage (see Flesh-Eating Weapons). Hit points lost to this weapon's damage can be regained only through a short or long rest, rather than by regeneration, magic, or any other means.

action.name: Mass Contagion (1/Day)
entries: Nergal releases a cloud of pestilence from his space that spreads out and around corners in a 120-foot radius and then dissipates. Up to twenty creatures Nergal chooses in the area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be subject to the effects of the {@spell contagion} spell.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Nergal makes a wounding spiked chain attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Nergal magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, to an unoccupied space he can see within 120 feet.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Nergal innately casts a spell.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Bune's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}). Bune can innately cast the following spells, requiring no verbal or material components:

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: Any creature hostile to Bune that starts its turn within 20 feet of him must make a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw, unless Bune is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Bune's Aura of Menace for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Blasphemous Benediction
entries: As a bonus action, Bune can touch one creature within 10 feet of him. If the target is evil or has any corruption, it makes attack rolls with advantage and its weapon attacks deal an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage for 1 minute.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Bune knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Fallen Weapons
entries: Bune's weapon attacks are magical. When Bune hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Bune fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Bune has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unsettling Presence
entries: A 150-foot radius of disturbance extends out from Bune, moves with him, and spreads around corners. Each beast that starts its turn in the area or moves into it must make a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw. The creature becomes {@condition frightened} for 1 minute on a failed save, or becomes immune to Bune's Unsettling Presence for 24 hours on a successful one. A creature {@condition frightened} in this way must take the Dash action on each of its turns to move away from Bune by the safest available route.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Bune makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Bune magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Hateful Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Bune emits magical divine energy.

Each creature of his choice in a 10-foot radius must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Implosion Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Bune targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the target can see him, the target must succeed on a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) force damage. If the damage drops the target to 0 hit points, it collapses in upon itself with a sickening pop and dies instantly.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Iblis's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 27}). Iblis can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Iblis knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Fallen Weapons
entries: Iblis's weapon attacks are magical. When Iblis hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Iblis fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Iblis has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Iblis makes two greatsword attacks or three longbow attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) slashing damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Slaying Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 15} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) fire damage. If the target is a creature that has 100 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or die.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Iblis makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Iblis magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Probe Soul
entries: Iblis examines the soul of one creature he can see within 120 feet. Until he takes this legendary action again or becomes {@condition incapacitated}, Iblis has advantage on all attack rolls he makes against the target.

legendary.name: Flames of Hatred (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Iblis releases the magical fire of his hate. Each creature of his choice in a 20-foot radius must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Thwart Magic (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Iblis chooses one creature, object, or magical effect that he can see and automatically ends any spell on the target that is 7th level or lower.

legendary.name: Killing Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Iblis targets one creature he can see within 90 feet of him. If the target can see him and has 90 hit points or less, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or die.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Врожденная способность падшего ангела к заклинаниям - Харизма (спасбросок от заклинаний {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} к попаданию при атаках заклинаниями). Падший ангел может произносить следующие заклинания, не требующие материальных компонентов:

trait.name: Accursed Weapons
entries: Атаки оружия падшего ангела являются магическими.
When the fallen angel hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Blasphemous Benediction
entries: As a bonus action, the fallen angel can touch one creature within 5 feet of her. If the target is evil or has any corruption, it makes attack rolls with advantage and its weapon attacks deal an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage for 1 minute.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Naamah has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: Naamah has five heads. While she has more than one head, she has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever Naamah takes 20 or more damage in a single turn, one of her heads dies. If all of her heads die, she dies.
At the end of her turn, Naamah regrows one of her heads, unless she has taken acid or fire damage since her last turn. Naamah regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Unsettling Presence
entries: A 30-foot radius of disturbance extends out from the fallen angel, moves with her, and spreads around corners.

Каждый зверь, который начинает свой ход в этой области или перемещается в нее, должен сделать {@dc 25} бросок на спасбросок мудрости. При неудачном спасброске существо становится {@condition frightened} на 1 минуту или становится невосприимчивым к падшему ангелу.

Unsettling Presence на 24 часа при успехе. Существо {@condition frightened}, попавшее таким образом, должно в каждый свой ход совершать действие Dash, чтобы удалиться от падшего ангела по наиболее безопасному из доступных путей.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fallen angel makes two flail attacks and as many bite attacks as she has heads.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage. If

Naamah scores a critical hit against a creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A {@condition stunned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The fallen angel magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than her own, or back into her true form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the Naamah's choice). Naamah reverts to her true form if she dies.

In a new form, Naamah retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but she lacks.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: Naamah makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Wriggling Move
entries: Naamah moves up to her speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Abyssal Darkness {@recharge}
entries: As a bonus action, the chernobue casts the {@spell darkness} spell.

trait.name: Aura of Misfortune
entries: The chernobue emits an aura of evil malaise that spreads out in a 30-foot radius. Whenever a creature that isn't a fiend starts its turn in the aura, it must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature makes attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws with disadvantage until the end of its next turn, while on a successful save, the creature becomes immune to this chernobue's Aura of Misfortune for 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The chernobue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The chernobue's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the chernobue has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chernobue makes four attacks: two with its antennae mouth and two with its tail. It can substitute a bite for one of these attacks.

action.name: Antennae Mouth
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage at the end of each of its turns until it regains any number of hit points or uses an action to stanch the wound.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) slashing damage and the chernobue pulls the target 5 feet toward itself.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become hideously deformed by the appearance of sucking orifices that appear all over the target's body. While deformed in this way, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by 10 and it makes attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws with disadvantage. In addition, whenever the target takes damage, it sprays filth from its orifices in a 5-foot radius. Each creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be hideously deformed as described above.
A hideously deformed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of a long rest, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Fascination (1/Day)
entries: The chernobue changes its coloration and posture to create a beguiling display that overloads the senses of creatures who can see it. Each creature within 30 feet of the chernobue that is not a fiend must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the {@condition incapacitated} creature's turns or whenever it takes damage, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this chernobue's Fascination for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Genital Maw
entries: When a creature moves to within 5 feet of the chernobue, it can make a bite attack against that creature.

reaction.name: Hijack Summoning (1/Week)
entries: When a fiend within 120 feet of the chernobue is being summoned to appear in another plane, the fiend does not appear and the chernobue goes in its place.

trait.name: Acid Spray
entries: Whenever the nyogoth takes piercing or slashing damage, it sprays from its body corrosive fluid. Each creature within 5 feet of the nyogoth must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) acid damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nyogoth makes five attacks: four with its maw and one with its bite.

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Teleport (3/Day)
entries: The nyogoth teleports to an unoccupied space that it can see within 120 feet of itself.

action.name: Fascination (1/Day)
entries: The nyogoth changes its coloration and posture to create a beguiling display that overloads the senses of creatures who can see it. Each creature within 30 feet of the nyogoth that is not a fiend must succeed on a {@dc 12} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the {@condition incapacitated} creature's turns or whenever it takes damage, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to
Fascination for the next 24 hours.

headerEntries: Shiggarreb is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). Shiggarreb has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Shiggarreb magically polymorphs into a Large or smaller humanoid that has a challenge rating equal to or less than her own, or back into her true form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Shiggarreb's choice). She reverts to her true form if she dies.

In a new form, Shiggarreb retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but she lacks.

action.name: Fascination (1/Day)
entries: Shiggarreb changes her coloration and posture to create a beguiling display that overloads the senses of creatures who can see it. Each creature within 30 feet of Shiggarreb that is not a fiend must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} for 1 minute. At the end of each of the {@condition incapacitated} creature's turns or whenever it takes damage, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Fascination for the next 24 hours.
